articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Emmanuel Macron's win welcomed by European leaders
articles.description: Relief as Macron beats far-right Marine Le Pen, while Putin urges president-elect to 'join forces' to ensure security.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Evacuation of Syrian rebels starts in Barzeh
articles.description: Hundreds of opposition fighters and their family members travelling to rebel-held Idlib province by bus as part of deal.

articles.author: Shafik Mandhai
articles.title: French election: What does Emmanuel Macron stand for?
articles.description: The centrist's pledge to cut state spending has earned him the distrust of many on the French left.

articles.author: Diana Al Rifai
articles.title: Syrians react to safe zones: 'We don't trust Russia'
articles.description: Residents say the new deal could benefit civilians but they fear that it might cover up for future regime violations.

articles.author: Azad Essa
articles.title: What can the UN do if your country cuts the internet?
articles.description: The UN considers the internet a human right, but governments are increasingly infringing on the rights of people online.

articles.author: Donald Collins
articles.title: The West's obsession with itself
articles.description: White-washing the history of the West will not make the Western civilisation great again.

articles.author: Patrick Strickland
articles.title: Why some refugees in Greece are being driven to suicide
articles.description: 'This is like a zoo and we're like animals,' says one refugee as others say a 'mental war' is being waged on them.

articles.author: Shafik Mandhai
articles.title: French elections 2017: Who is Emmanuel Macron?
articles.description: Incoming president faces challenges from reforming the economy to winning the trust of voters who shunned the election.

articles.author: Roman Dobrokhotov
articles.title: Macron, Putin and the boomerang effect
articles.description: How the Kremlin's hackers managed to spoil Moscow's relations with the new French president even before he was elected.

articles.author: Amandas Ong
articles.title: The women and men who clean London at night
articles.description: As others head home, a community of cleaners start work in insecure jobs that often leave them vulnerable to abuse.
